title: Sunveil Alley
description: A narrow, sun-dappled alley lined with cafés, artisan boutiques, and flower boxes spilling into the street. A perfect blend of charm and daily life.

title: Temple of Highwinds
description: An ancient marble temple perched on the cliffs above the city. Dedicated to the wind gods, it offers sweeping views and centuries of myth.

title: Via Verde Promenade
description: A peaceful pedestrian walkway along the hillside, flanked by cypress trees and elegant railings. Popular for morning strolls and festivals.

title: Arborview Park
description: A vibrant public park with wide lawns, playgrounds, and a music pavilion. Known for its weekend farmers’ markets and open-air performances.

title: San Aurelio Lookout
description: A scenic overlook with a panoramic view of the Illyrian coast. Home to an old bell tower and a favorite spot for wedding photos.

title: Red Tile Overlook
description: A rooftop vantage point with a stunning view of Illyria’s famous terracotta skyline. Best visited at golden hour.

title: Garden of the Moonmask
description: A mysterious garden surrounding a weathered statue rumored to be a forgotten deity. Local legend says wishes whispered here may come true.

title: Hall of Echoes
description: Ruins of an ancient forum known for its uncanny acoustics. Speak aloud, and your voice may return in unexpected ways.
